column5: I will be at Nestor Falls staying on Lake ofthe Woods July 7- 14 and would like to try crow for some lake trout.What would the trout fishing be like by then?

The Lake Trout will be in their summer patterns in 100' of water or more. I'd fish the East end of the lake. Watch the gulls. If they start feasting on dead bait and flying over the same area, change to that area. Use large bucktailed jigs, sonars and other typical baits. Stope by the Anglers Pro Shop at Sunset Place and talk to Thatcher or Phil. They will fill in details. Good Luck
